name: Burden (itch) (Blaze)
description:
Burden is a very simple intense management  game where you do one thing, hold your burden. you must keep going to try and finish your game (there is no end) don't drop your burden or carry to much, or you will fail.

I made this game in 7 hours for the Blackthornprod game jam

theme : gamedev

Music by ozzed! https://ozzed.net/
